Actions.Name: When a card's properties are changed
Actions.Description: Triggers when one of the card's properties are changed

Actions.Name: Create Card
Actions.Description: Creates a new card with the parameters provided

Actions.Name: Move card to another column
Actions.Description: Move a card on the selected board

Actions.Name: When a card is created
Actions.Description: Triggers when a card is created on the defined board

Actions.Name: When a card is due
Actions.Description: Triggers on the date that the card is due
